status_signaling.definition: The overt display of resources to establish hierarchy.

lust_for_power.definition: Seeking control over others to satisfy ego (Pride) and dominance desires (Lust).

comfort_hoarding.definition: Prioritizing personal comfort and routine over growth or helping others.

righteous_anger.definition: Anger expressed when perceiving injustice, fueled by moral superiority.

social_comparison.definition: Measuring self-worth by comparing achievements and possessions to others.

people_pleasing.definition: Compulsive desire to be liked, sacrificing authenticity for approval.
